comments.content: this is surely impressive, but at the same time I'm so glad I was never required to construct an image or self-portrait using type in college. Oh don't get me wrong, we had plenty of other exercises involving typescapes, but I think creating images out of type \*before\* you understand type is certain future humiliation…
